snippet: WAGNER--Paul Alexander. The trustees and staff of Library of America are deeply saddened by the death of our friend and patron Paul Alexander Wagner, whose passion for American literature, especially Mark Twain, inspired us all. We send sincere condolences to his wife Jeanette Sarkisian Wagner. Elizabeth W. Smith, Chair of the Board Cheryl Hurley, President 1/3
lead_paragraph: WAGNER--Paul Alexander. The trustees and staff of Library of America are deeply saddened by the death of our friend and patron Paul Alexander Wagner, whose passion for American literature, especially Mark Twain, inspired us all. We send sincere condolences to his wife Jeanette Sarkisian Wagner. Elizabeth W. Smith, Chair of the Board Cheryl Hurley, President 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  WAGNER, PAUL ALEXANDER
